title: Review current pipeline and logging gaps
acceptance_criteria: outputs/logging_review.txt exists and lists current logging behavior and identified gaps

title: Implement logging module for the pipeline
acceptance_criteria: outputs/logging_module_changes.txt exists and describes added/updated files for the logging module

title: Write usage documentation for the logging module
acceptance_criteria: outputs/logging_usage_doc.md exists with setup steps and an example showing how to use the logging module
